entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 near mainland valleys and inlets late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
